document_data.name: Olisara Lightsong
document_data.mainbody: '''Olisara Lightsong''' was a [[Harper]] agent in [[Phlan]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/Raiders of the Twilight Marsh|4}}
document_data.Personality: Olisara was a wise lead agent. She was a direct individual with a dry sense of humor. Olisara displayed an almost disconcerting amount of knowledge regarding those with whom she held audience and used this to bend them to her agenda.{{Cite adventurers league/Shackles of Blood|8-9}}
